name: k6-moonbit-test
description: Test suite for k6 MoonBit library

scripts.test:local: npm run docker:up && npm run test ; npm run docker:down
scripts.test:json:local: npm run docker:up && npm run test:json ; npm run docker:down
scripts.ci: npm install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.ci:verify: npm run build && npm run build:verify && npm run test:json && npm run verify
scripts.ci:verify:local: npm run build && npm run build:verify && npm run test:json:local && npm run verify
